P180672.pdo:
The overarching goal for the Assam transportation sector support  is to “provide green transportation and climate resilient roads and bridges infrastructure and integrate smallholding farmers and tribal communities in Assam with the South and Southeast Asian markets.”  The overarching goal will be achieved by implementing series of operations (SOPs). 
	
SOP 1: The project development objective (PDO) for the Assam Resilient Rural Bridges Program (P178581) approved on March 2, 2024 is to build green, inclusive, and resilient connectivity in rural Assam and strengthen the Assam Public Works Roads Department’s roads and bridges management capability. 
	
SOP 2: The PDO for the proposed Assam Disaster Resilient Hill Roads Development Project (P180672) is to enhance climate disaster resilience of hill roads and promote green and inclusive market access in selected hill areas of Assam.  The proposed project development objective is to enhance climate disaster resilience of hill roads and promote green and inclusive market access in selected hill areas of Assam.
P180672.project_name: Assam Disaster Resilient Hill Roads Development Project

P179630.impagency: State Unitary Enterprise "Smart City" under executive state authority of Dushanbe city
P179630.pdo: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve solid waste service delivery and institutional capacity in Dushanbe.

P181008.pdo: Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve access to resilient, climate-smart, and integrated urban justice infrastructure and selected integrated justice services for citizens in Romania.
